name: Superior Pilot Services (Pty) Ltd
about: Superior Pilot Services (Pty) Ltd, based at Grand Central Airport in Midrand, South Africa, is a professional pilot training school dedicated to providing personalized and comprehensive flight training. As part of the Superior Aviation group, we offer a range of courses from Private Pilot's Licence (PPL) to Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), including night ratings and other specialized training programs. Our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities ensure that students receive high-quality education and hands-on training. We are committed to fostering a safe and supportive learning environment, helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. With a focus on excellence and safety, Superior Pilot Services is your trusted partner in aviation training.
